remarks: The domain of the matrix vector multiplication function.  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2019.)
statement:
mavmuldm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
mavmuldm.c $e |- C = ( B ^m ( M X. N ) ) $.
mavmuldm.d $e |- D = ( B ^m N ) $.
mavmuldm.t $e |- .x. = ( R maVecMul <. M , N >. ) $.
mavmuldm $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ M e. Fin /\ N e. Fin ) -> dom .x. = ( C X. D ) ) $.
